thread.title: Bishops endorse Pope Francis' call for more merciful church
thread.title_full: Video: Bishops endorse Pope Francis' call for more merciful church | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Bishops endorse Pope Francis' call for more merciful church
text: Pope Francis closed a three-week meeting of Catholic Bishops on Sunday that focused on the church's position on family issues. The Bishop's expressed a more tolerant view toward divorced Catholics, but blocked any reconsideration of the church's stance on gay marriage. Philip Pullella, the Vatican correspondent for Reuters, joins William Brangham to discuss.
